attributes.action: Stand by the will of the Lebanese people and support their revolution
attributes.additional_details: Tens of billions of dollars spent since the civil war ended in 1990, Lebanon still has fallen apart infrastructure,  including daily electricity cuts, rubbish still piled on the streets causing pollution and leading to bad health, limited water supplies from yhe sate-owned company. We are demanding a sweeping overhaul of Lebanon's political system
attributes.background:
The Lebanese people have been suffering from severe economic conditions in the heavily indebt country due to their tax increases, with anti-goverment protests many times in 2019.
As mentioned in alijazeera

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
